content: Interesting article. Hey at least chinese painters can get a job! Unlike the USA where most artists work in food service or something until they are too humiliated to continue. Haha, not like your company is hiring americans to do the painting. In case you want some quick market research, I would much rather buy a custom painting by a chinese studio than one made by a robot. Art repro companies have been printing paint-esque images on canvas for years, it looks terrible, but obviously a market. Have you tried using a 3D printer?
